com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations

Class Marker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.Annotation
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.Marker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Annotation>

    public class Marker
extends Annotation
    Marker is an annotation that shows an icon image at a geographical location.

    An InfoWindow can be shown when a Marker is pressed
